00071   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072   // Read/Write volume data contained by this object.
00073   // This sub-object is specific to each
00074   // type of volume that needs to be read in.  This can be used
00075   // to clean up the special cases which handle
00076   // volumes of various types, such as dicom, header, etc.  In
00077   // future these things can be moved here.  Each read/write 
00078   // sub-object corresponds to a vtkMrmlVolumeReadWriteNode subclass.
00079   // These subclasses write any needed info in the MRML file.
00080   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081   vtkSetObjectMacro(ReadWrite,vtkMrmlDataVolumeReadWrite);
00082   vtkGetObjectMacro(ReadWrite,vtkMrmlDataVolumeReadWrite);
